thread.title: Why Brexit could sink Britain's Eurovision hopes

title: Why Brexit could sink Britain's Eurovision hopes
text:
Why Brexit could sink Britain's Eurovision hopes 9:58am BST - 01:13
The UK's record at the Eurovision Song Contest has been pretty dire in recent years, and the country's decision to leave the EU could make matters even worse, according to British band Bucks Fizz, who won the competition in 1981. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
